Education of Dars-e-Nizami

(According To The Prescribed Syllabus Of The Wifaq-Ul-Madaris-Al-Arabiah Pakistan)
[vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” margin_top=”5″ margin_bottom=”10″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1609334552444{margin-bottom: 10px !important;background-image: url(https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/bg-vector-2-1.png?id=541) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1609334955491{background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”]

Educational Stages

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1609421449362{padding-top: 30px !important;}”]There are two stages of learning the Quran

  1. Learning and reciting Quranic words with correct accent.
  2. Understanding the concept and meaning of Quran.

In order to perform second duty, there is an ‘Aalima Course (Department of Dars-e-Nizami)’ in the institute, in which we offer the first six years of studies among the eight years of this course. After that, students enroll in other well-known universities in the country to complete their courses. We pay special attention to each student in our institute.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_single_image image=”16315″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_outline” border_color=”green” css_animation=”slideInRight”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” margin_top=”5″ margin_bottom=”10″ type=”vc_default” css=”.vc_custom_1609334624333{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_single_image image=”16317″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” border_color=”green” css_animation=”slideInLeft”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1609421487761{padding-top: 30px !important;}”]Essay writing, English and Urdu handwriting competitions and debate competitions are arranged in the institute, which is why none of our students who participated in the annual examination of Wifaq-ul-Madaris-al-Arabiah ever failed. On the contrary, for the first time in the history of Wifaq-ul-Madaris-al-Arabiah, our students have secured three positions (1st, 2nd, and 3rd) in Saaniah Aammah. In addition, students also demonstrated excellence in other fields.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” equal_height=”yes” rtl_reverse=”yes” bg_type=”image” parallax_style=”vcpb-vz-jquery” bg_image_new=”id^2399|url^https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/Slider-2.jpg|caption^null|alt^null|title^Slider 2|description^null” bg_img_attach=”fixed” enable_overlay=”enable_overlay_value” overlay_color=”#000000″ overlay_pattern=”01.png” overlay_pattern_opacity=”90″ overlay_pattern_attachment=”fixed” css=”.vc_custom_1609421722817{background-color: #000000 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Highlighted Features

[vc_column_text]

  • Corrective Training of Students: The Assembly is convened daily for the corrective training of students in which teachers describe the informative knowledge of Islam. Statements of different scholars from Karachi are also used on monthly basis for reformative training and educational development.
  • Sponsorship Programs: The institute provides sponsorship programs for the poor and under privileged children of the country who cannot afford their educational expense. Devotees of the institute pay special attention to the educational expenses of such students, which leads goodness in the world and the hereafter.
  • Residence: A Hostel is available for student residence in which we offer quality meals three times a day.
    Treatment: Sick students are provided medical treatment.

Examination System

Monthly Reviews: Every month, two books of each level are reviewed.

Quarterly Examinations: After three months, all books of the grade are examined.

Half-Yearly Examinations: This test is also considered as a quarterly exam.

Annual Examination: After completion of education, all subjects and lessons are reviewed, after which the student is promoted to next level.

Admission Procedure

Students of Dars-e-Nizami have to go through several stages and only after passing these tests a candidate given admission. Student’s academic qualities and mental aptitude determine the possibility of their admission. An examination committee is formed for the admission process, which includes written examinations, speech & debate, and other stages. Following documents are required for admission in Dars-e-Nizami:

1. Certificate of passing middle (class 8) 2. Certificate of Mutawassita from wifaq-ul-Madaris-al-Arabiah
3. Student’s B-Form 4. A photocopy of father’s CNIC

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”15″ css=”.vc_custom_1609248903073{margin-right: 50px !important;margin-left: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1609421984791{border-top-width: 5px !important;border-right-width: 5px !important;border-bottom-width: 5px !important;border-left-width: 5px !important;border-left-color: #b1650d !important;border-left-style: double !important;border-right-color: #b1650d !important;border-right-style: double !important;border-top-color: #b1650d !important;border-top-style: double !important;border-bottom-color: #b1650d !important;border-bottom-style: double !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

Educational Fee

Department of Dar-e-Nizami is in the branch which is situated in Ayub Goth, under the management of the institute.

The Department of Dars-e-Nizami which performs the duty of propagating Islam is rendering unselfish services.

No fee is charged from any student. Their needs are met through Zakat, donations, and Charity.

.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1609421995329{border-top-width: 5px !important;border-right-width: 5px !important;border-bottom-width: 5px !important;border-left-width: 5px !important;border-left-color: #b1650d !important;border-left-style: double !important;border-right-color: #b1650d !important;border-right-style: double !important;border-top-color: #b1650d !important;border-top-style: double !important;border-bottom-color: #b1650d !important;border-bottom-style: double !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

Transportation

Transportation is not the responsibility of institute.

Parents are responsible for arranging transportation themselves.

However, the management of institution will definitely assist in such matters.
